mapper.insert: MERGE INTO FOLLOW f USING ( SELECT #{followerUid} AS "FOLLOWERuId", #{followingUid} AS "FOLLOWINGuId" FROM dual ) src ON ( f."FOLLOWERuId" = src."FOLLOWERuId" AND f."FOLLOWINGuId" = src."FOLLOWINGuId" ) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ("FOLLOWERuId", "FOLLOWINGuId", CREATEDAT) VALUES (src."FOLLOWERuId", src."FOLLOWINGuId", SYSTIMESTAMP)
